dt-api.name: button().index()
dt-api.summary: Get the index of a node

type.returns: A Buttons index that can be used with `-api button()` or `-api button().add()` to determine the index of a given button node. Returns `null` if not matched.
type.description: Gets the index of a button in a Buttons instance.

dt-api.description: This method can be used to determine the index of a button, which can be useful when inserting new buttons into a list, particularly for a plug-in where you can't hardcode indexes.
